segments.text: The kitchen setup is straightforward, with cabinets and a sink along the wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window brightens the room nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron is methodically drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water is flowing steadily into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy uses a stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing from the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, expecting to get one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems a bit unsteady under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden path looks well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are organized on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical busy afternoon in the home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everyone's occupied with their little tasks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open curtains let in a fresh breeze.
segments.speaker: PAR
